features: PerioBrite Natural Mouthwash Alcohol Free Cool Mint Formulated by a Dentist, Nature’s Answer PerioBrite Natural Mouthwash does more than keep breath fresh and clean, it promotes periodontal health, which is important for a healthy mouth.* In fact, daily cleansing and rinsing with PerioBrite helps promote healthy teeth and gums without the concerns about fluoride, because it’s fluoride free.*

Only PerioBrite Natural Mouthwash contains a unique combination of soothing organic wildcrafted herbs, well-known for their cleansing action, together with Co-Q10, Folic Acid, Oregano, Cinnamon and Clove to support tissue and gum health.* It naturally moistens gum tissue for long-lasting results when used as part of an oral health program.*
PerioBrite Natural Mouthwash is all natural and alcohol free it fights bad breath and relieves dry mouth naturally, energizing your mouth with a cool, sparkling minty-fresh feeling.*

Nature’s Answer Unique Bio-Chelation process. Only Nature’s Answer uses a unique Bio-Chelation process, developed by the company’s founder and owner. It includes “cold extraction.” Cold extraction, allows the raw plant materials to be extracted without being exposed to heat, capturing and preserving the holistic balance of the herbs in Nature’s Answer PerioBrite Natural Mouthwash.

Nature’s Answer can compare and analyze the quality and purity of every incoming botanical used to formulate their products, assuring you that the wildcrafted herbs, Oregano, Cinnamon and Clove in Nature’s Answer PerioBrite Natural Mouthwash are the purest, highest-quality botanical ingredients.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Perio Brite Charcoal Toothpaste Only PerioBrite Natural Mouthwash contains a unique combination of soothing organic wildcrafted herbs, well-known for their cleansing action, together with Co-Q10, Folic Acid, Oregano, Cinnamon and Clove to support tissue and gum health.* It naturally moistens gum tissue for long-lasting results when used as part of an oral health program.*(FDA Disclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease). Patented Phytoplenolin Dentist formulated PerioBrite Natural Brightening Toothpaste contains Phytoplenolin, a patented herbal extract that has been shown in independent laboratory studies to promote cell vitality. Soothing wildcrafted herbs, well-known for their cleansing action, are combined with CoQ10, Folic Acid, Oregano, Cinnamon and Clove to promote tissue and gum wellness. Smile Naturally These supplements offer the ideal way to experience the benefits of high quality Standardized herbs. NO ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS, sweeteners, or preservatives. Gluten-Free. Fluoride-Free. Soy-Free. SLS-free.

Family Owned and Operated for Over 4 Decades From humble beginnings back in 1972 to our modern state-of-the-art facility, Nature’s Answer has evolved into one of today’s largest family-owned and operated manufacturers of high-quality nutritional products. The Genius of Mother Nature in Every Product Our state of the art laboratory equipment has identified each and every plant’s distinctive botanical fingerprint, which we then use as our baseline to analyze the quality and purity of every incoming botanical used to manufacture our products. The Nature's Answer Concentrated True Herbal Extract Difference Our extracts are made to the highest quality standard, and we verify what is in every bottle. Before our extracts are released to you, the consumer, they go through over 60 quality control checks by our Quality Control team, holding each extract to stringent standards. Our herbal formulas stand the test of time - over four decades of proven performance. Our vertically integrated manufacturing process allows us to have complete traceability from plant to shelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mouth rinse has been hard to find in the health food stores lately. Which is why I ended up ordering it online. If you have any type of periodontal issues this is the rinse for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Whitens and doesn't burn
reviews.reviewText: Whitens teeth, no burn, noticed improved dental health. Been using for over 7 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It Works Great for Me!
reviews.reviewText: This stuff was a game changer for my oral health, personally. I didn't think it was amazing or anything until I ran out and was able to recall what morning breath was again. Yikes. It obviously does its job better than I had realised, albeit in a subtle way, and I've become a repeat buyer since. An important note for me, as an "invisible braces" wearer, is that this stuff causes no issues with my hardware and rather keeps it sparkling. The flavour could have more of a minty punch, but that's just personal preference... or maybe my expectations of what a mouthwash "should" taste like is an illusion. I'm a fan of this stuff regardless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Wow, my husband uses this product every day and loves it! Thank you for making an excellent product that provides fresh breath, as well as cleans the teeth well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Strong natural mouthwash
reviews.reviewText: This is a very strong all natural mouthwash. I can tell it is quite effective, but next time I would go for the sensitive version. It creates a burning sensation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I’m big on dental hygiene, because I despise the dentist. So this aids with my brush, floss, tongue scrape and mouth wash routine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mouth feels really clean
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this mouthwash!!! I love that my mouth feels really clean without the burning sensation that the alcohol from regular mouthwash leaves. This is the only mouthwash I use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This is my absolute favorite mouthwash ever. Taste is fresh and leaves your mouth feeling clean!
